abstract: The Republican members of the Senate Banking Committee on Friday wrote a letter expressing their displeasure with the proposed timetable of Christopher J. Dodd, the committee’s chairman, for his bill overhauling financial regulation.
snippet: The Republican members of the Senate Banking Committee on Friday wrote a letter expressing their displeasure with the proposed timetable of Christopher J. Dodd, the committee’s chairman, for his bill overhauling financial regulation.
lead_paragraph: The Republican members of the Senate Banking Committee on Friday wrote a letter expressing their displeasure with the proposed timetable of Christopher J. Dodd, the committee’s chairman, for his bill overhauling financial regulation.

headline.main: Senate Republicans Protest Timing of Dodd Bill
